name: Just get 10
description:
The game where super simple becomes devilishly difficult.

Find the same number in colourful tiles and combine them to grow up.
Just enjoy this beautiful and addictive game!

HOW TO PLAY :
Tap the adjacent tiles with same number, and they will merge in the position you tap.
Try to get 10, or even higher!

FEATURES:
· Endless challenge
· Easy to play, hard to master
· Simple and colorful design

Compete with other players in Game Center!
